breakfast.name: Potato Sauté
breakfast.description: Crispy golden potatoes sautéed with onions and spices.
steps: Peel and dice the potatoes.
Heat oil in a pan and add the potatoes.
Add the onions and spices.
Cook until the potatoes are golden brown.
Garnish with fresh corriander leaves and serve hot.

breakfast.name: Scrambled Eggs
breakfast.description: Fluffy scrambled eggs with butter and herbs.
steps: Beat the eggs in a bowl.
Heat butter in a pan and add the eggs.
Add the herbs and spices.
Cook until the eggs are fluffy.
Serve hot with toast.

breakfast.name: Arrow roots
breakfast.description: Boiled or roasted arrow roots, rich in flavor and nutrients.
steps: Peel the arrow roots and cut into small pieces.
Boil in salted water until soft.
Drain the water and serve hot.

breakfast.name: Sweet Tea
breakfast.description: Warm, sweet, and refreshing Kenyan-style tea.
steps: Put Sugar in a pan and add little water.
Stir slowly on low heat until the sugar caramelizes.
Add tea leaves,cardamon and freshly crushed ginger.
Stir then add your milk and water once the aroma oozes,don't let it burn.
Increase heat and let it boil until ready to serve.

lunch.name: Coconut Fish
lunch.description: Fish cooked in a creamy coconut sauce with spices.
steps: Clean the fish and marinate with salt
Fry the fish until golden brown.
In a separate pan, heat the chopped onions,crushed garlic,tomatoes and rosemary.
Stir until the tomatoes are soft and paste like or blend it.
Add abit of water and coconut milk and stir.
Add the fish and cook until the sauce thickens.
Garnish with fresh corriander leaves and serve hot(brown ugali,rice or chapattis).

lunch.name: Wet Fried Liver
lunch.description: Tender liver cooked in a rich tomato-based sauce.
steps: Clean your liver with vinegar and water.
Drain and add into a pan with hot oil.
Add a tea spoon of salt and any other spices you like.
Fry until slightly brown.
Add chopped onions and tomatoes and stir.
Add a little water and let it simmer until the sauce thickens.
Garnish with fresh herbs and serve hot.

lunch.name: Traditional Chicken
lunch.description: Authentic Kenyan-style chicken slow-cooked in traditional spices.
steps: Cut the chicken after you've charred it on a grill.
Clean the chicken and marinate with salt and spices.
Put it a pressure cooker for 10 minutes.
Separate the chicken from the stock and fry until slightly brown.
Add chopped onions, garlic,ginger and tomatoes and stir on low heat.
Add the chicken stock and let it simmer until the sauce thickens.
Garnish with fresh corriander leaves and serve hot.

lunch.name: Deep Fried Fish
lunch.description: Crispy golden deep-fried fish served with fresh kachumbari.
steps: Clean the fish and marinate with salt and spices.
Fry the fish until golden brown.
Serve hot with kachumbari and brown ugali.

dinner.name: Vegetable Rice
dinner.description: Rice cooked with assorted vegetables and aromatic spices.
steps: Wash your rice and soak for 30 minutes.
Let boil until ready to serve.
In a separate pan, heat oil and add the chopped onions, garlic and stir until golden brown.
Add in your slightly boiled(with sugar) carrots, peas and green beans.
Stir-Fry for 5-6 minutes on medium heat.
Add the rice in bits as you stir until well mixed.
Garnish with fresh corriander leaves and serve hot.

dinner.name: Carrot Chapattis
dinner.description: Soft chapattis infused with grated carrots for extra flavor.
steps: Mix your flour with grated carrots and salt plus two pinches of sugar.
Add warm water and oil in bits knead until the dough is soft.
Let it rest for 30 minutes.
Roll out the dough and cook on a hot pan until slightly brown.
Serve hot with your favorite stew.

sweet-treats.name: Mini Cardamom Mandazis
sweet-treats.description: Small, spiced mandazis with a hint of cardamom.
steps: Mix your flour with baking powder,sugar,cardamon and a pinch of salt.
Add warm water or milk and knead until the dough is soft.
Let it rest through the night or 5hrs.
Roll out the dough and cut into small pieces.
Deep fry until golden brown.
Serve hot with sweet tea or coffee.

sweet-treats.name: Cookies
sweet-treats.description: Crunchy, homemade cookies with a soft center.
steps: Mix your 2 well beat eggs with baking powder,sugar,cinnamon,vanilla essence and a pinch of salt.
Add flour in bits knead until the dough is soft.
Let it rest for 30 minutes.
Let the oven heat at 180 degrees.
Roll out the dough and cut into small pieces.
Bake until golden brown for 25 minutes and 180 degrees.
Serve hot with sweet tea or coffee.

sweet-treats.name: Cinnamon Rolls
sweet-treats.description: Soft, sweet rolls with a rich cinnamon filling and icing.
steps: Mix your flour with baking powder,sugar,cinnamon and a pinch of salt.
Add warm water or milk and knead until the dough is soft.
Let it rest for 30 minutes.
Roll out the dough and spread the cinnamon filling.
Roll the dough and cut into small pieces.
Bake until golden brown for 50 minutes and 180 degrees.
Serve hot with sweet tea or coffee.
